### Step 1 ###
# prepare phenotype data which has been generated by p03_grad2heritability.py
# enter the phenotype directory 
e.g., $ cd /data/p_02378/evolution/solar/LL-RR/G1/

### Step 2 ### 
# make header files for nodes
$ ./s01_solar_run.sh G1 180
# output: G1.header  --> will have a list of all nodes
# it looks like:
  node_1
  node_2
  node_3
  node_4
  node_5
  ...

### Step 3 ### get HCP files 
# HCP files downloaded from "nitric". Now are here: /data/HCP_pedi/
  house.gz
  pedigree.info
  pedindex.cde
  pedindex.out
  phi2.gz
# Now copy them to main analysis directory

### Step 4 ### 
# univariate heritability analysis in SOLAR 
# load SOLAR environment
$ SOLARECL
$ ./s02_solar_run_herit.sh G1.header G1.csv # G1.header generated by step 2, G1.csv is the phenotype data.
# output: G1.csv_solar.run.inorm  --> list of solar commands
# pass the commands to solar
$ solar < G1_LSUB.csv_solar.run.inorm
# creates a results folder for each model:
  node_1_INORM
  node_2_INORM
  node_3_INORM
  node_4_INORM
  ...

### Step 5 ### 
# read out heritability results
$ ./s03_solar_run_assemble_herit.sh G1_results_herit.csv # it's a random rank please sort yourself
